title: UPS profits: Alarming news comes next day air
teaser: UPS is out this morning with a warning that its profits will be lower than expected. What does that signal for the rest of the economy?
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday, July 12, 2013
contentencoded: UPS is out this morning with a warning that its profits will be lower than expected. Chris Low, chief economist with FTN Financial, joins Marketplace's Mark Garrison to explain what UPS's revised forecast signals for the rest of the economy.
description: UPS is out this morning with a warning that its profits will be lower than expected. What does that signal for the rest of the economy?
